psionic.name: Adaptive Body
entries: 你可以改变自己的身体以适应周围的环境，使你能够承受惩罚性的环境。有了更大的psi能量，你可以把这种保护扩展到其他人身上。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you don't need to eat, breathe, or sleep. To gain the benefits of a long rest, you can spend 8 hours engaged in light activity, rather than sleeping during any of it.

modes.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: 作为一个行动，你或你接触的生物在接下来的一小时内无视极热或极冷的影响（但不包括冷或火的伤害）。

modes.name: Adaptive Shield
entries: 当你受到酸、冷、火、闪电或雷电伤害时，你可以使用你的反应来获得对该类型伤害的抗性--包括触发的伤害--直到你下一回合结束。

modes.name: Energy Adaptation
entries: As an action, you can touch one creature and give it resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (your choice), which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

modes.name: Energy Immunity
entries: As an action, you can touch one creature and give it immunity to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (your choice), which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

psionic.name: Aura Sight
entries: 你重新聚焦你的视线，看到围绕所有生物的能量。你能感知光环，这些能量特征可以揭示生物本质的关键要素。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks.

modes.name: Assess Foe
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你分析你所看到的一个生物的光环。你可以了解它目前的总命中率以及所有的免疫力、抵抗力和脆弱性。

modes.name: Read Moods
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以学习一个词来概括你能看到的最多六个生物的情绪状态，例如快乐、困惑、恐惧或暴力。

modes.name: View Aura
entries: As an action, you study one creature's aura. Until your {@status concentration} ends, while you can see the target, you learn if it's under the effect of any magical or psionic effects, its current hit point total, and its basic emotional state. While this effect lasts, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma checks you make against it.

modes.name: Perceive the Unseen
entries: As a bonus action, you gain the ability to see auras even of {@condition invisible} or hidden creatures. Until your {@status concentration} ends, you can see all creatures, including hidden and {@condition invisible} ones, regardless of lighting conditions.

psionic.name: Beacon
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你可以使亮光从你的身体辐射到20英尺范围内，并使暗光辐射到另外20英尺。光线的颜色可以随你喜欢。光线持续1小时，你可以作为奖励动作提前将其熄灭。

psionic.name: Bestial Form
entries: 你改造你的身体，获得不同野兽的特征。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

modes.name: Bestial Claws
entries: 你在一瞬间显现出长爪，并对你周围5英尺内的一个生物进行近战武器攻击。一旦命中，这次攻击会对每一个消耗的psi点造成{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}的砍伤。

modes.name: Bestial Transformation
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以改变你的身体形态以获得不同的特性。当你使用这个能力时，你可以选择以下一个或多个效果。每个效果都有它自己的psi点成本。把它们加在一起才能确定总成本。这种转变持续1小时，直到你死亡，或者直到你作为奖励动作结束它。

submodes.name: Amphibious
entries: 你获得了鳃；你可以呼吸空气和水。

submodes.name: Climbing
entries: 你长出微小的钩状爪子，使你获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度。

submodes.name: Flight
entries: 翅膀从你的背部长出。你获得的飞行速度与你的步行速度相等。

submodes.name: Keen Senses
entries: 你的眼睛和耳朵变得更加敏感。你在智慧({@skill Perception})检查中获得优势。

submodes.name: Perfect Senses
entries: 你获得敏锐的嗅觉和探测猎物的本能。你可以看到10英尺内的生物和物体，即使你是{@condition invisible}。

submodes.name: Swimming
entries: 你的手指和脚趾间获得鳍和蹼；你获得的游泳速度与你的步行速度相等。

submodes.name: Tough Hide
entries: 你的皮肤会变得像皮革一样坚韧；你获得一个+2的交流奖励。

psionic.name: Blade Meld
entries: 作为奖励动作，你持有的单手近战武器与你的手融为一体。在接下来的一分钟内，你不能放开武器，也不能强迫它离开你的手掌。

psionic.name: Blind Spot
entries: As an action, you erase your image from the mind of one creature you can see within 120 feet of you; the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or you are {@condition invisible} to it until the end of your next turn.

psionic.name: Brute Force
entries: 你用幻术能量增强你的自然力量，使你有能力实现不可思议的力量。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks

modes.name: Brute Strike
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你对你在当前回合内用近战攻击击中的目标的下一个伤害卷获得一个奖励。奖励等于+{@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi}每一个psi点的花费，并且奖励的伤害与攻击的类型相同。如果攻击有一个以上的伤害类型，你可以选择使用哪一个作为额外伤害。

modes.name: Knock Back
entries: 当你用近战攻击击中一个目标时，你可以作为一个反应激活这个能力。目标必须在力量救赎中成功，否则就会被打到离你10英尺远的地方，每花一个磅数。目标在一条直线上移动。如果它撞上了一个物体，这个移动就会立即结束，并且目标会受到{@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi}的重击伤害，每消耗一个psi点。

modes.name: Mighty Leap
entries: 作为你运动的一部分，你在任何方向上跳跃，每消耗一个psi点最多20英尺。

modes.name: Feat of Strength
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你获得一个+5的力量检查奖励，直到你下一个回合结束。

psionic.name: Celerity
entries: 你将幻象力导入你的身体，将你的反应和敏捷性磨练到一个不可思议的程度。世界似乎变慢了，而你却继续正常地移动。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

modes.name: Rapid Step
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你每花一个psi点就能增加你的行走速度10英尺，直到当前回合结束。如果你有攀爬或游泳的速度，这种增加也适用于该速度。

modes.name: Agile Defense
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以采取躲避动作。

modes.name: Blur of Motion
entries: As an action, you cause yourself to be {@condition invisible} during any of your movement during the current turn.

modes.name: Surge of Speed
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你获得两个好处，直到当前回合结束：你不会挑起机会攻击，并且你有一个等于你步行速度的攀爬速度。

modes.name: Surge of Action
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以冲刺或进行一次武器攻击。

psionic.name: Corrosive Metabolism
entries: 你对自己身体的控制使你能发出酸或毒的攻击。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have resistance to acid and poison damage

modes.name: Corrosive Touch
entries: 作为一个动作，你向你范围内的一个生物提供酸液的接触。目标必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败，每消耗一个psi点会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}酸的伤害，如果蓄力成功，则受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Venom Strike
entries: As an action, you create a poison spray that targets one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} poison damage per psi point spent and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

modes.name: Acid Spray
entries: As a reaction when you take piercing or slashing damage, you cause acid to spray from your wound; each creature within 5 feet of you takes {@damage 2d6} acid damage.

modes.name: Breath of the Black Dragon
entries: 你呼出一股酸液，排成60英尺宽的队伍，宽度为5英尺。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个宪法规定的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到{@damage 6d6}酸的伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。你每多花一个psi点，就可以增加1%的伤害。

modes.name: Breath of the Green Dragon
entries: 你在90英尺的范围内呼出一团毒云。队伍中的每个生物都必须做一个宪法救赎动作，如果救赎失败，将受到{@damage 10d6}的毒药伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

psionic.name: Crown of Despair
entries: 你已经学会了在一个生物的心灵中收获绝望的种子，用自我怀疑和不作为来缠绕它。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

modes.name: Crowned in Sorrow
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内的一个你能看到的生物必须做一个魅力拯救动作。拯救失败时，它每花一个psi点就会受到{@damage 1d8}的精神伤害，并且在下一回合开始前不能做出反应。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Call to Inaction
entries: If you spend 1 minute conversing with a creature, you can attempt to seed it with overwhelming ennui. At the end of the minute, you can use an action to force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition charmed}. On a failed save, it sits and is {@condition incapacitated} until your {@status concentration} ends. This effect immediately ends if the target or any ally it can see is attacked or takes damage. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected and has no inkling of your attempt to bend its will.

modes.name: Visions of Despair
entries: As an action, you force one creature you can see within 60 feet of you to make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Dolorous Mind
entries: As an action, you choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. It must succeed on a Charisma saving throw, or it is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0 until your {@status concentration} ends. It can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Crown of Disgust
entries: 你使一个生物充斥着厌恶的情绪。
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, the area in a 5 foot radius around you is {@quickref difficult terrain||3} for any enemy that isn't immune to being {@condition frightened}.

modes.name: Eye of Horror
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个魅力拯救动作。拯救失败时，它每消耗一个psi点就会受到{@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi}的精神伤害，并且在下一回合结束前不能再靠近你。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Wall of Repulsion
entries: As an action, you create an invisible, insubstantial wall of energy within 60 feet of you that is up to 30 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Any creature attempting to move through it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't move through the wall until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature can pass through it. A creature must make this save whenever it attempts to pass through the wall, whether willingly or unwillingly.

modes.name: Visions of Disgust
entries: You cause a creature to regard all other beings as horrid, alien entities. As an action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 5d6} psychic damage, and until your {@status concentration} ends, it takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage per creature within 5 feet of it at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the target takes only half the initial damage and suffers none of the other effects.

modes.name: World of Horror
entries: 作为一个动作，在你60英尺范围内选择最多六个生物。每个目标必须做一个 "魅力 "救赎。拯救失败时，目标会受到{@damage 8d6}的精神伤害，而且是{@condition frightened}，直到你{@status concentration}结束。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。当{@condition frightened}受此效果影响时，目标的速度被降低到0，目标可以使用它的行动，以及它可能有的任何额外行动，只进行近战攻击。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功后结束对自己的效果。如果目标或它能看到的任何盟友被攻击或受到伤害，这个效果会立即结束。拯救成功时，该生物不受影响，并且对你试图屈服于它的意志毫无察觉。

psionic.name: Crown of Rage
entries: 你在一个生物的脑海中放置一粒纯粹的怒火，使它的嗜血欲望战胜它的感官，让它按照你的意愿行事。
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, any enemy within 5 feet of you that makes a melee attack roll against creatures other than you does so with disadvantage

modes.name: Primal Fury
entries: As an action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or take {@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi} psychic damage per psi point spent on this ability and immediately use its reaction to move its speed in a straight line toward its nearest enemy. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Fighting Words
entries: If you spend 1 minute conversing with a creature, you can attempt to leave a simmering violence in its mind. At the end of the minute, you can use an action to force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw to resist feeling violent urges against one creature you describe to it or name. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition charmed}. On a failed save, the target attacks the chosen creature if it sees that creature before your {@status concentration} ends, using weapons or spells against a creature it was already hostile toward or unarmed strikes against an ally or a creature it was neutral toward. Once the fight starts, it continues to attack for 5 rounds before this effect ends. This effect immediately ends if the target or any ally it can see is attacked or takes damage from any creature other than the one it has been incited against. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected and has no inkling of your attempt to bend its will.

modes.name: Mindless Courage
entries: You cause a creature's bloodlust to overcome its sense of preservation. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or, until the end of your next turn, it can't willingly move unless its movement brings it closer to its nearest enemy that it can see. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Punishing Fury
entries: You cause a creature's rage to grow so hot that it attacks without heeding its own safety. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or, until your {@status concentration} ends, any creature within 5 feet of it can use a reaction to make a melee attack against it whenever the target makes a melee attack. The save automatically succeeds if the target is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

psionic.name: Delusion
entries: 作为一个行动，你在你周围60英尺内你能看到的一个生物的脑海中植入一个错误的信念。你可以创造一个声音或一个图像。只有这个天赋的目标能感知到你创造的声音或图像。
如果你创造一个声音，它的音量可以从耳语到尖叫不等。它可以是你的声音，也可以是别人的声音，也可以是生物的吼叫，也可以是乐器，也可以是你挑选的任何其他声音。它的持续时间为1分钟。
如果你创造一个物体，它必须适合在5英尺的立方体内，而且不能移动或反射。该影像不能产生任何影响视觉以外的感官的效果。该影像持续1分钟，如果生物触碰它，它就会消失。

psionic.name: Diminution
entries: 你操纵构成你身体的物质，在不放弃任何力量的情况下大幅缩小你的尺寸。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

modes.name: Miniature Form
entries: As a bonus action, you become Tiny until your {@status concentration} ends. While this size, you gain a +5 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks and can move through gaps up to 6 inches across without squeezing.

modes.name: Toppling Shift
entries: As a bonus action, you shift to an incredibly small size and then suddenly return to normal, sending an opponent flying backward. Choose one creature you can see within 5 feet of you. It must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

modes.name: Sudden Shift
entries: 当你被攻击击中时，作为一种反应，你会转移到最小的尺寸以避免攻击。攻击不中，你最多可以移动5英尺而不引起机会攻击，然后恢复到正常体型。

modes.name: Microscopic Form
entries: As a bonus action, you become smaller than Tiny until your {@status concentration} ends. While this size, you gain a +10 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks and a +5 bonus to AC, you can move through gaps up to 1 inch across without squeezing, and you can't make weapon attacks.

psionic.name: Energy Beam
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 90 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (your choice).
当你达到5级（{@damage 2d8}）、11级（{@damage 3d8}）和17级（{@damage 4d8}）时，该天赋的伤害增加{@dice 1d8}。

psionic.name: Giant Growth
entries: 你为自己注入幻觉能量，使自己长到巨大的尺寸，增强你的力量和耐久性。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, your reach increases by 5 feet.

modes.name: Ogre Form
entries: As a bonus action, you gain 10 temporary hit points. In addition, until your {@status concentration} ends, your melee weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage on a hit, and your reach increases by 5 feet. If you're smaller than Large, you also become Large for the duration.

modes.name: Giant Form
entries: As a bonus action, you gain 30 temporary hit points. In addition, until your {@status concentration} ends, your melee weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage on a hit, and your reach increases by 10 feet. If you're smaller than Huge, you also become Huge for the duration.

psionic.name: Intellect Fortress
entries: 你在你的思想周围铸造了一道不屈不挠的幻觉能量墙--它使你能够对你的对手发起反击。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain resistance to psychic damage.

modes.name: Psychic Backlash
entries: 作为反应，如果你能看到攻击者，你可以在针对你的攻击卷上施加不利条件。如果攻击仍然击中你，攻击者会受到{@damage 2d10}的精神伤害。

modes.name: Psychic Parry
entries: 当你进行智力、智慧或魅力救赎时，作为一种反应，你在这个能力上每花费一个psi点，你就获得一个救赎的+1奖励。你可以在掷骰子之后但在承受结果之前使用这个能力。

modes.name: Psychic Redoubt
entries: 作为一个动作，你创造一个保护性的精神能量场。选择你周围30英尺内的任何数量的生物。直到你的{@status concentration}结束，每个目标都对精神伤害有抵抗力，并且在智力、智慧和魅力方面有优势，生物不受影响，也不知道你试图改变它的意志。

psionic.name: Iron Durability
entries: 你将自己的身体转化为活生生的金属，使你能够摆脱那些会使弱小生物致残的攻击。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

modes.name: Iron Hide
entries: 当你被攻击击中时，作为一种反应，你在这个能力上每花费一个psi点，你就获得一个+1的AC奖励。该奖励持续到你下一回合结束。该奖励适用于触发的攻击。

modes.name: Steel Hide
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你获得对打击、穿刺和砍击伤害的抵抗，直到你下一个回合结束。

modes.name: Iron Resistance
entries: As an action, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice), which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

psionic.name: Light Step
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你改变你的密度和重量以提高你的移动能力。在你剩下的回合中，你的行走速度增加了10英尺，而且本回合你第一次站起来时，如果你的速度大于0，你就不用消耗任何移动力。

psionic.name: Mantle of Awe
entries: 你学会了使用幻觉能量，用psi和你自己的自然魅力的微妙组合来操纵他人。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain a bonus to Charisma checks. The bonus equals half your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

modes.name: Charming Presence
entries: 作为一个行动，你会施加一个同情力量的光环。在这个能力上每花费一个psi点，就会滚动{@dice 2d8}；总数就是这个选项可以影响多少命中率的生物。在你30英尺范围内的生物按其最大命中率升序受到影响，忽略{@condition incapacitated}的生物、对{@condition charmed}免疫的生物以及参与战斗的生物。

Starting with the creature that has the lowest hit point maximum, each creature affected by this option is {@condition charmed} by you for 10 minutes, regarding you as a friendly acquaintance. Subtract each creature's hit point maximum from the total before moving on to the next creature. A creature's hit point maximum must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

modes.name: Center of Attention
entries: As an action, you exert an aura of power that grabs a creature's attention. Choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. It must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is so thoroughly distracted by you that all other creatures are {@condition invisible} to it until your {@status concentration} ends. This effect ends if the creature can no longer see or hear you or if it takes damage.

modes.name: Invoke Awe
entries: As an action, you exert an aura that inspires awe in others. Choose up to 5 creatures you can see within 60 feet of you. Each target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you until your {@status concentration} ends. While {@condition charmed}, the target obeys all your verbal commands to the best of its ability and without doing anything obviously self-destructive. The {@condition charmed} target will attack only creatures that it has seen attack you since it was {@condition charmed} or that it was already hostile toward. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Mantle of Command
entries: 你施加一个信任和权威的光环，加强你的盟友之间的协调。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, when you end your turn and didn't move during it, you can use your reaction to allow one ally you can see within 30 feet of you to move up to half their speed, following a path of your choice. To move in this way, the ally mustn't be {@condition incapacitated}.

modes.name: Coordinated Movement
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，在你60英尺范围内选择你能看到的最多五个盟友。这些盟友中的每一个都可以使用他们的反应来移动，速度达到他们的一半，沿着你选择的路径。

modes.name: Commander's Sight
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。直到你下一个回合开始，你的盟友在对该目标的攻击卷轴上有优势。

modes.name: Command to Strike
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的盟友。该盟友可以使用他们的反应来立即采取攻击行动。你选择目标。

modes.name: Strategic Mind
entries: As an action, you exert an aura of trust and command that unites your allies into a cohesive unit. Until your {@status concentration} ends, any ally within 60 feet of you on their turn can, as a bonus action, take the Dash or Disengage action or roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to each attack roll they make that turn.

modes.name: Overwhelming Attack
entries: 作为一个动作，在你的60英尺范围内选择你能看到的最多五个盟友。这些盟友中的每个人都可以使用他们的反应来采取攻击行动。你选择攻击的目标。

psionic.name: Mantle of Courage
entries: 你把心思集中在勇气上，向你的盟友放射出自信和勇敢。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you and allies within 10 feet of you who can see you have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

modes.name: Incite Courage
entries: As a bonus action, choose up to six creatures you can see within 60 feet of you. If any of those creatures is {@condition frightened}, that condition ends on that creature.

modes.name: Aura of Victory
entries: As a bonus action, you project psionic energy until your {@status concentration} ends. The energy fortifies you and your allies when your enemies are felled; whenever an enemy you can see is reduced to 0 hit points, you and each of your allies within 30 feet of you gain temporary hit points equal to double the psi points spent to activate this effect.

modes.name: Pillar of Confidence
entries: 作为一个行动，你和你周围60英尺内最多五个你能看到的生物各获得一个额外的行动，在你的单独回合中使用。如果在你的下一回合结束前没有使用，该动作就会消失。该动作只能用于进行一次武器攻击或采取冲刺或脱离的动作。

psionic.name: Mantle of Fear
entries: 你利用原始的恐惧之井，将自己变成敌人的恐怖灯塔。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

modes.name: Incite Fear
entries: As an action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you until your {@status concentration} ends. Whenever the {@condition frightened} target ends its turn in a location where it can't see you, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

modes.name: Unsettling Aura
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你将自己笼罩在令人不安的精神能量中。直到你的{@status concentration}结束，任何在你60英尺范围内能看到你的敌人，每向你移动一英尺就必须多花一英尺的移动距离。如果一个生物对被{@condition frightened}.精灵免疫，就会忽略这个效果。在它的每个回合中，它都可以重复蓄力，在成功的情况下结束对自己的效果。如果这个生物不能再看到或听到你，或者它受到伤害，则ct结束。

modes.name: Incite Panic
entries: As an action, choose up to eight creatures you can see within 90 feet of you that can see you. At the start of each of a target's turns before your {@status concentration} ends, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn, and you roll a die. If you roll an odd number, the {@condition frightened} target moves half its speed in random direction and takes no action on that turn, other than to scream in terror. If you roll an even number, the {@condition frightened} target makes one melee attack against a random target within its reach. If there is no such target, it moves half its speed in a random direction and takes no action on that turn. This effect end on a target if it succeeds on three saving throws against it.

psionic.name: Mantle of Fury
entries: 你让潜伏在你脑海深处的原始怒火迸发出来，让你和你的盟友陷入不可遏止的嗜血状态。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline in combat, you and any ally who starts their turn within 10 feet of you gains a 5 foot increase to their walking speed during that turn.

modes.name: Incite Fury
entries: As a bonus action, choose up to three allies you can see within 60 feet of you (you can choose yourself in place of one of the allies). Until your {@status concentration} ends, each target can roll a {@dice d4} when rolling damage for a melee weapon attack and add the number rolled to the damage roll.

modes.name: Mindless Charge
entries: 作为一个额外动作，在你60英尺范围内选择最多3个你能看到的生物。每个目标可以立即使用它的反应，以它的速度在一条直线上向最近的敌人移动。

modes.name: Aura of Bloodletting
entries: 作为一个额外动作，你释放一个愤怒的光环。直到你的{@status concentration}结束，你和你周围60英尺内的任何生物在该回合的近战攻击卷上都有优势。如果目标对它的三次蓄力攻击成功，这个效果就会结束。在它的每个回合中，它可以重复蓄力攻击，如果成功，就会结束对自己的效果。

modes.name: Overwhelming Fury
entries: As an action, you flood rage into one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw, or it can use its actions only to make melee attacks until your {@status concentration} ends. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Mantle of Joy
entries: 你挖掘你内心的喜悦，以舒缓、通灵的能量向外辐射，给你周围的生物带来希望和安慰。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks

modes.name: Soothing Presence
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，在你60英尺范围内选择最多三个你能看到的生物。每个目标在此效果上每花费一个psi点就会获得3个临时命中点。

modes.name: Comforting Aura
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，选择最多三个你能看到的盟友（你可以选择自己来代替其中一个盟友）。在你的{@status concentration}结束之前，每个目标在做拯救动作时可以掷出{@dice d4}，并将掷出的数字加入总数中。如果成功，则结束对自己的影响。如果生物不能再看到或听到你，或受到伤害，则ct结束。

modes.name: Aura of Jubilation
entries: As a bonus action, you radiate a distracting mirth until your {@status concentration} ends. Each creature within 60 feet of you that can see you suffers disadvantage on any checks using the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Investigation} skills.

modes.name: Beacon of Recovery
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你和你周围60英尺范围内的最多五个盟友可以立即对他们正在遭受的每一个允许在回合开始或结束时进行拯救的效果进行拯救。

psionic.name: Mastery of Air
entries: 你与空气元素的力量融为一体。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you take no falling damage, and you ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3} when walking.

modes.name: Wind Step
entries: 作为你回合中动作的一部分，你每花一个psi点就可以飞到20英尺。如果你在空中结束这次飞行，你就会坠落，除非有其他东西将你固定在高空。

modes.name: Wind Stream
entries: 作为一个动作，你创造一条长30英尺、宽5英尺的聚焦空气线。该区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次力量救赎，每消耗一个psi点会受到{@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi}重击伤害，救赎失败则被击倒{@condition prone}，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Cloak of Air
entries: As a bonus action, you seize control of the air around you to create a protective veil. Until your {@status concentration} ends, attack rolls against you have disadvantage, and when a creature you can see misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to force the creature to repeat the attack roll against itself.

modes.name: Wind Form
entries: As a bonus action, you gain a flying speed of 60 feet, which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

modes.name: Misty Form
entries: As an action, your body becomes like a misty cloud until your {@status concentration} ends. In this form, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and you can't take actions other than the Dash action. You can pass through openings that are no more than 1 inch wide without squeezing.

modes.name: Animate Air
entries: As an action, you cause an air elemental to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The elemental lasts until your {@status concentration} ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Fire
entries: 你将你的思想与火元素的能量结合起来。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain resistance to fire damage, and you gain a +2 bonus to rolls for fire damage.

modes.name: Combustion
entries: 作为一个行动，在你120英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物或物体。目标必须做一个宪法救赎。如果救赎失败，目标每消耗一个psi点就会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}的火焰伤害，并且着火，在每个回合结束时受到{@damage 1d6}的火焰伤害，直到你的{@status concentration}结束，或者直到它或与它相邻的生物用一个行动来熄灭火焰。拯救成功后，目标会受到一半的伤害并且不会着火。关于它的状态块，请参见《怪物手册》。

modes.name: Rolling Flame
entries: As an action, you create fire in a 20-foot-by-20-foot cube within 5 feet of you. The fire lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Any creature in that area when you use this ability and any creature that ends its turn there takes 5 fire damage.

modes.name: Detonation
entries: 作为一个动作，你在你周围120英尺范围内可以看到的一个点上制造一个火热的爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到{@damage 7d6}的火焰伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Fire Form
entries: As a bonus action, you become wreathed in flames until your {@status concentration} ends. Any creature that end its turn within 5 feet of you takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage.

modes.name: Animate Fire
entries: As an action, you cause a fire elemental to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The elemental lasts until your {@status concentration} ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Force
entries: 作为一名幻象能力的学生，你能感知到流经万物的潜在能量。你用你的意念伸出去，将潜能转化为实际。物体和生物在你的指挥下移动。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Strength checks.

modes.name: Push
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个力量救赎的动作。拯救失败时，它每消耗一个psi点会受到{@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi}力量伤害，并且每消耗一个psi点会被推到离你最远的直线上5英尺。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Move
entries: 在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的、没有被其他生物穿戴或携带的、没有被固定住的物体。它的边长不能超过20英尺，它的最大重量取决于花在这个能力上的psi点数，如下所示。
作为一个动作，你可以将该物体移动到60英尺，并且在移动过程中你必须保持该物体在视线范围内。如果物体在空中结束这次移动，它就会掉下来。如果该物体会落在一个生物身上，该生物必须在DC 10的灵巧投掷中获得成功，否则会受到下表所列的伤害。

modes.name: Inertial Armor
entries: 作为一个动作，你将自己包裹在一个无形的魔力场中。在8小时内，你的基本攻击力为14+你的灵巧修饰，并且你获得对力量伤害的抵抗。如果你穿着或穿着盔甲，这个效果就会结束。

modes.name: Telekinetic Barrier
entries: As an action, you create a transparent wall of telekinetic energy, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 40 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 inch thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Each 10-foot section of the wall has an AC of 10 and 10 hit points.

modes.name: Grasp
entries: You attempt to grasp a creature in telekinetic energy and hold it captive. As an action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} by you until your {@status concentration} ends or until the target leaves your reach, which is 60 feet for this grapple.

The {@condition grappled} target can escape by succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check contested by your psionic ability plus your proficiency bonus. When a target attempts to escape in this way, you can spend psi points to boost your check, abiding by your psi limit. You gain a +1 bonus per psi point spent.
当目标以这种方式被{@condition grappled}时，你以行动的方式创造下列效果之一。

modes.name: Crush
entries: 每消耗一个psi点，目标会受到{@scaledamage 1d6|1-7|1d6|psi}重击伤害。

modes.name: Move
entries: 每消耗一个psi点，你最多可以移动目标5英尺。你可以把它移到空中，并把它固定在那里。如果抓捕结束，它就会坠落。

psionic.name: Mastery of Ice
entries: 你掌握冰的力量，塑造它以满足你的要求。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have resistance to cold damage.

modes.name: Ice Spike
entries: 作为一个动作，你向你周围120英尺内你能看到的一个生物投掷一个冰球。目标必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作。如果救赎失败，目标会在每一个psi点上受到{@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi}的寒冷伤害，并且其速度减半，直到你下一个回合开始。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Ice Sheet
entries: As an action, choose a point on the ground you can see within 60 feet of you. The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on that point becomes covered in ice for 10 minutes. It is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and any creature that moves more than 10 feet on it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. If the surface is sloped, a creature that falls {@condition prone} in the area immediately slides to the bottom of the slope.

modes.name: Frozen Sanctuary
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你用冰冷的复原力将自己包裹起来。你获得20个临时命中点。

modes.name: Frozen Rain
entries: 作为一个动作，在你120英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的点。以该点为中心的20英尺半径的球体中的空气会变得死一般的寒冷，并被水分所饱和。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个 "宪法救赎"。拯救失败时，目标会受到{@damage 6d6}的寒冷伤害，并且它的速度会降低到0，直到你的{@status concentration}结束。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。
作为一个行动，被降低速度的目标可以提前结束效果，如果它成功地进行力量（竞技）检查，其DC等于这个效果的保存DC。
You can increase this effect's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per each additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Ice Barrier
entries: As an action, you create a wall of ice, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Each 10-foot section of the wall has AC 12 and 30 hit points. A creature that damages the wall with a melee attack takes cold damage equal to the damage the creature dealt to the wall.

psionic.name: Mastery of Light and Darkness
entries: 你要求用你的思想支配光明和黑暗。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, natural and magical darkness within 30 feet of you has no effect on your vision.

modes.name: Darkness
entries: 作为一个行动，你创造一个神奇的黑暗区域，使黑暗视觉失效。在你周围60英尺内选择一个你能看到的地方。魔法黑暗从该点辐射出一个半径为10英尺的球体，每花一个psi点在这个能力上。二级或以下的法术所产生的光线在这个区域被抑制。

modes.name: Light
entries: As an action, an object you touch radiates light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Alternatively, a creature you touch radiates light in the same manner if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. While lit in this manner, it can't hide, and attack rolls against it gain advantage.

modes.name: Shadow Beasts
entries: As an action, you cause two {@creature shadow||shadows} to appear in unoccupied spaces you can see within 60 feet of you. The {@creature shadow||shadows} last until your {@status concentration} ends, and they obey your verbal commands. In combat, roll for their initiative, and choose their behavior during their turns. When this effect ends, the {@creature shadow||shadows} disappear. See the Monster Manual for their stat block.

modes.name: Radiant Beam
entries: 作为一个动作，你向你周围60英尺内你能看到的一个生物投射一道光束。目标必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作。如果救赎失败，它将受到{@damage 6d6}辐射伤害，并被{@condition blinded}，直到你的{@status concentration}结束。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。一个{@condition blinded}的目标可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，在成功时结束对自己的影响。请参考怪物手册中的状态块。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。
You can increase this effect's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per each additional psi point spent on it.

psionic.name: Mastery of Water
entries: 你的思想与水元素融为一体，使你的思想与水的起伏相协调。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and you can breathe underwater.

modes.name: Desiccate
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个 "宪法救赎"，在这个能力上花费的每一个psi点会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}坏死伤害，或者在成功的情况下受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Watery Grasp
entries: As an action, you unleash a wave that surges forth and then retreats to you like the rising tide. You create a wave in a 20-foot-by-20-foot square. At least some portion of the square's border must be within 5 feet of you. Any creature in that square must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is pulled up to 10 feet closer to you. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Water Whip
entries: As an action, you unleash a jet of water in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Strength saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, you can move each target that fails its saving throw to any unoccupied space touching the line. You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 3d6|3-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Water Breathing
entries: 作为一项行动，你可以赋予自己和你周围60英尺内的最多10个自愿的生物在接下来的24小时内进行水下呼吸的能力。

modes.name: Water Sphere
entries: As an action, you cause a sphere of water to form around a creature. Choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it becomes trapped in the sphere of water until your {@status concentration} ends. While the target is trapped, its speed is halved, it suffers disadvantage on attack rolls, and it can't see anything more than 10 feet away from it. However, attack rolls against it also suffer disadvantage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

modes.name: Animate Water
entries: As an action, you cause a water elemental to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The elemental lasts until your {@status concentration} ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mastery of Weather
entries: 你的思想伸向天空，重塑风暴的东西以满足你的需要。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have resistance to lightning and thunder damage.

modes.name: Cloud Steps
entries: As an action, you conjure forth clouds to create a solid, translucent staircase that lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. The stairs form a spiral that fills a 10-foot-by-10-foot area and reaches upward 20 feet per psi point spent.

modes.name: Hungry Lightning
entries: As an action, you lash out at one creature you can see within 60 feet of you with tendrils of lightning. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, with disadvantage if it's wearing heavy armor. The target takes {@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} lightning damage per psi point spent on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

modes.name: Wall of Clouds
entries: As an action, you create a wall of clouds, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Creatures can pass through it without hindrance, but the wall blocks vision.

modes.name: Whirlwind
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的点。风在以该点为中心的20英尺半径的范围内呼啸。球体中的每个生物都必须成功地进行力量投掷，否则会受到{@damage 1d6}重击伤害，并被移动到球体中你选择的一个无人空间。球体中任何松散的物体，如果重量不超过100磅，就会被移动到球体中你所选择的一个未被占用的空间。

modes.name: Lightning Leap
entries: 作为一个动作，你放出一条长60英尺、宽5英尺的闪电线。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败，会受到{@damage 6d6}的闪电伤害，如果蓄力成功，会受到一半的伤害。然后你可以瞬移到一个被这条线触及的无人空间。
You can increase this ability's damage by {@scaledamage 6d6|5-7|1d6|psi} per additional psi point spent on it.

modes.name: Wall of Thunder
entries: As an action, you create a wall of thunder, at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Every foot moved through the wall costs 1 extra foot of movement. When a creature moves into the wall's space for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or it takes {@damage 6d6} thunder damage, is pushed in a straight line up to 30 feet away from the wall, and is knocked {@condition prone}.

modes.name: Thunder Clap
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的点。雷霆能量在以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内爆发。该区域内的每个生物都必须做出宪法规定的拯救动作。拯救失败时，目标会受到{@damage 8d6}的雷霆伤害，而且是{@condition stunned}，直到你下一回合结束。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。

psionic.name: Mastery of Wood and Earth
entries: 你调整你的心智，夺取对木材和土地的控制权。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have a +1 bonus to AC.

modes.name: Animate Weapon
entries: As an action, your mind seizes control of a one-handed melee weapon you're holding. The weapon flies toward one creature you can see within 30 feet of you and makes a one-handed melee weapon attack against it, using your discipline attack modifier for the attack and damage rolls. On a hit, the weapon deals its normal damage, plus an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} force damage per psi point spent on this ability. The weapon returns to your grasp after it attacks.

modes.name: Warp Weapon
entries: 作为一个行动，选择一个你能看到的60英尺范围内的一个生物所持有的非魔法武器。该生物必须成功地进行力量救赎，否则所选择的武器不能用于攻击，直到你下一回合结束。

modes.name: Warp Armor
entries: 作为一个行动，选择一个你能看到的60英尺范围内的一个生物所穿的非魔法盔甲。该生物必须在宪法救赎中成功，否则该生物的攻击力将变为10+其灵巧修饰，直到你下一回合结束。

modes.name: Wall of Wood
entries: As an action, you create a wall of wood at least one portion of which must be within 60 feet of you. The wall is 60 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. Each 5-foot wide section of the wall has AC 12 and 100 hit points. Breaking one section creates a 5-foot by 5-foot hole in it, but the wall otherwise remains intact.

modes.name: Armored Form
entries: As a bonus action, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

modes.name: Animate Earth
entries: As an action, you cause an earth elemental to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The elemental lasts until your {@status concentration} ends, and it obeys your verbal commands. In combat, roll for its initiative, and choose its behavior during its turns. When this effect ends, the elemental disappears. See the Monster Manual for its stat block.

psionic.name: Mind Meld
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以与你周围120英尺范围内你能看到的一个自愿的生物进行心灵感应。目标必须有至少2的智力，否则这个天赋就会失败，行动就会被浪费。
这种交流可以发生在当前回合结束之前。你不需要与目标共享一种语言，它就能理解你的心灵感应，即使它缺乏一种语言，也能理解你。你还可以获得目标所选择的一段记忆，获得它所看到或做过的一件事的完美回忆。

psionic.name: Mind Slam
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} force damage. If it takes any of this damage and is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition prone}.
当你达到5级（{@damage 2d6}）、11级（{@damage 3d6}）和17级（{@damage 4d6}）时，该天赋的伤害增加{@dice 1d6}。

psionic.name: Mind Thrust
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 120 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take {@damage 1d10} psychic damage.
当你达到5级（{@damage 2d10}）、11级（{@damage 3d10}）和17级（{@damage 4d10}）时，该天赋的伤害增加{@dice 1d10}。

psionic.name: Mystic Charm
entries: As an action, you beguile one humanoid you can see within 120 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you until the end of your next turn.

psionic.name: Mystic Hand
entries: 你可以用你的行动来操纵或移动你30英尺内的一个物体。该物体的重量不能超过10磅，而且你不能影响一个被其他生物佩戴或携带的物体。如果物体是松散的，你可以在任何方向上移动它达30英尺。
这种天赋可以让你打开一扇没有上锁的门，倒出一个啤酒罐，等等。
如果你让它悬浮在半空中，该物体会在你的回合结束时落到地上。

psionic.name: Nomadic Arrow
entries: 你给远程武器注入了一种奇怪的情感，使它能够准确无误地找到自己的目标。
psionic.focus: While you are focused on this discipline, any attack roll you make for a ranged weapon attack ignores disadvantage. If disadvantage would normally apply to the roll, that roll also can't benefit from advantage.

modes.name: Speed Dart
entries: As a bonus action, you imbue one ranged weapon you hold with psionic power. The next attack you make with it that hits before the end of the current turn deals an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} psychic damage per psi point spent.

modes.name: Seeking Missile
entries: 当你用远程武器攻击失败时，作为一种反应，你可以对同一目标重复攻击卷。

modes.name: Faithful Archer
entries: As a bonus action, you imbue a ranged weapon with a limited sentience. Until your {@status concentration} ends, you can make an extra attack with the weapon at the start of each of your turns (no action required). If it is a thrown weapon, it returns to your grasp each time you make any attack with it.

psionic.name: Nomadic Chameleon
entries: 你创造了一个扭曲你外表的精神力量屏幕，使你能够融入背景，甚至变成隐形人。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

modes.name: Chameleon
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以尝试隐藏，即使你没有达到所需的要求。在当前回合结束时，只有当你满足正常的隐藏要求时，你才能保持隐藏。

modes.name: Step from Sight
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，从视线中隐蔽自己。你在这个能力上每多花一个psi点，就可以多瞄准一个生物。增加的目标必须对你可见，并且在你的60英尺范围内。每个目标都会变成{@condition invisible}，并保持如此，直到你的{@status concentration}结束，或者直到它以攻击、法术或其他能力瞄准、伤害或影响任何生物之后。

modes.name: Enduring Invisibility
entries: As a bonus action, you turn {@condition invisible} and remain so until your {@status concentration} ends.

psionic.name: Nomadic Mind
entries: 你把你的一部分精神派遣到 "无界"，这是生物拥有的思想和知识的集体视野。
psionic.focus: Whenever you focus on this discipline, you choose one skill or tool and have proficiency with it until your focus ends. Alternatively, you gain the ability to read and write one language of your choice until your focus ends.

modes.name: Wandering Mind
entries: 你进入了深深的沉思。如果你专注于这个选项的全部持续时间，你就会获得以下最多三个技能的熟练度（每花费2个psi点就有一个技能）。{@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Religion}, 和 {@skill Survival}。该益处持续1小时，不需要{@status concentration}。

modes.name: Find Creature
entries: 你用你的意念去寻找关于某个特定生物的信息。如果你在这个选项的整个持续时间内集中注意力，你就会获得对该生物当前位置的大致了解。你会了解它所在的地区、城市、城镇、村庄或地区，确定一个边长在1到3英里之间的区域（由DM选择）。如果该生物是在另一个存在的平面上，你就会了解哪个平面。

modes.name: Item Lore
entries: 你仔细研究一件物品。如果你在这个选项的全部持续时间内集中精力，同时保持在物品的5英尺范围内，你就会获得对该物品施展识别法术的好处。

modes.name: Psychic Speech
entries: 作为一项行动，你将你的思想与所有语言的精神印记相适应。在1小时内，你获得理解你听到的或试图阅读的任何语言的能力。此外，当你说话时，所有能理解某种语言的生物都能听懂你说的话，不管你用什么语言。

modes.name: Wandering Eye
entries: As an action, you create a psychic sensor within 60 feet of you. The sensor lasts until your {@status concentration} ends. The sensor is invisible and hovers in the air. You mentally receive visual information from it, which has normal vision and darkvision with a range of 60 feet. The sensor can look in all directions. As an action, you can move the sensor up to 30 feet in any direction. There is no limit to how far away from you the eye can move, but it can't enter another plane of existence. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter.

modes.name: Phasing Eye
entries: 如同上面的游荡之眼，除了眼睛可以在固体物体中移动，但不能在其中结束其移动。如果它这样做了，效果立即结束。

psionic.name: Nomadic Step
entries: 你对你周围的区域施加你的意念，扭曲你所感知到的平面内的路径，以允许瞬间旅行。
psionic.focus: After you teleport on your turn while focused on this discipline, your walking speed increases by 10 feet until the end of the turn, as you are propelled by the magic of your teleportation. You can receive this increase only once per turn.

modes.name: Step of a Dozen Paces
entries: 如果你在你的回合中还没有移动，你可以采取一个额外的行动，每花费一个psi点就可以传送到一个你能看到的未被占领的空间，并且你的速度会降低到0，直到回合结束。

modes.name: Nomadic Anchor
entries: 作为一个动作，你在你周围120英尺范围内可以看到的5英尺立方体中创造一个看不见的、无形的传送锚。在接下来的8小时内，每当你使用这种幻术修炼来传送时，你都可以转而传送到锚上，即使你看不到它，但它必须在传送能力的范围内。

modes.name: Defensive Step
entries: 当你被攻击击中时，你可以用你的反应来获得一个+4的攻击力加成，可能会把它变成一个失误。然后你会传送到一个你能看到的无人的空间，最多 10 英尺。

modes.name: There and Back Again
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你最多可以传送20英尺到一个你能看到的未被占领的空间，然后以你一半的速度移动。在你的回合结束时，你可以传送回你在传送前占据的位置，除非它现在被占据或在不同的存在平面。

modes.name: Transposition
entries: 如果你在你的回合中还没有移动，选择一个你能看到的在你周围60英尺内的盟友。作为一个额外的行动，你和那个生物会传送，交换位置，你的速度会降低到0，直到该回合结束。如果你们中的任何一个不能进入目的地的空间，这个能力就会失败并被浪费掉。

modes.name: Baleful Transposition
entries: 作为一个行动，在你120英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。该生物必须做一个智慧救赎动作。如果拯救失败，你和那个生物就会被传送，交换位置。如果你们中的任何一个不能进入目的地的空间，这个能力就会失败并被浪费掉。

modes.name: Phantom Caravan
entries: 作为一个行动，你和你所选择的60英尺范围内的最多6个自愿的生物可以传送到你能看到的地方，最多可以传送1英里。如果在到达点没有一个开放的空间让所有的目标占据，这个能力就会失败并被浪费掉。

modes.name: Nomad's Gate
entries: As an action, you create a 5-foot cube of dim, gray light within 5 feet of you. You create an identical cube at any point of your choice within 1 mile that you have viewed within the past 24 hours. Until your {@status concentration} ends, anyone entering one of the cubes immediately teleports to the other one, appearing in an unoccupied space next to it. The teleportation fails if there is no space for the creature to appear in.

psionic.name: Precognition
entries: 通过分析你周围的信息，从微妙的暗示到看似不相干的事实，你学会了在瞬间编织一串概率，给你带来非凡的洞察力。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

modes.name: Precognitive Hunch
entries: As a bonus action, you open yourself to receive momentary insights that improve your odds of success; until your {@status concentration} ends, whenever you make an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the total.

modes.name: All-Around Sight
entries: 作为对攻击你的回应，你用你的反应对该攻击卷施加不利条件，可能导致其失误。

modes.name: Danger Sense
entries: As an action, you create a psychic model of reality in your mind and set it to show you a few seconds into the future. Until your {@status concentration} ends, you can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, attack rolls against you can't gain advantage, and you gain a +10 bonus to initiative.

modes.name: Victory Before Battle
entries: 当你掷出主动权时，你可以使用这个能力给予你自己和60英尺内你所选择的最多五个生物一个+10的主动权奖励。

psionic.name: Psionic Restoration
entries: 你挥舞着幻术能量，为自己和他人治疗伤口并恢复健康。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you can use a bonus action to touch a creature that has 0 hit points and stabilize it.

modes.name: Mend Wounds
entries: As an action, you can spend psi points to restore hit points to one creature you touch. The creature regains {@scaledice 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi} hit points per psi point spent.

modes.name: Restore Health
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以接触一个生物，并从它身上移除以下其中一个条件。{@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, 或 {@condition poisoned}。或者，你可以从该生物身上移除一种疾病。

modes.name: Restore Life
entries: 作为一个行动，你触摸一个在过去一分钟内死亡的生物。该生物会以1点生命值恢复生命。这个能力不能使因年老而死亡的生物恢复生命，也不能使缺少任何重要身体部位的生物恢复。

modes.name: Restore Vigor
entries: As an action, you can touch one creature and choose one of the following: remove any reductions to one of its ability scores, remove one effect that reduces its hit point maximum, or reduce its {@condition exhaustion} level by one.

psionic.name: Psionic Weapon
entries: 你已经学会了如何将幻觉能量导入你的攻击，赋予它们破坏性的力量。
psionic.focus: Whenever you focus on this discipline, choose one weapon you're holding or your unarmed strike. When you attack with it while focused on this discipline, its damage is psychic and magical, rather than its normal damage type. Until you reach 6th level as a mystic, you don't add your Strength or Dexterity modifier to the psychic attack's damage rolls.

modes.name: Ethereal Weapon
entries: 作为奖励动作，你暂时将你持有的一件武器或你的徒手攻击转化为纯粹的灵能。在你的回合结束前，你用它进行的下一次攻击会忽略目标的护甲，不需要攻击卷。取而代之的是，目标对这一纪律进行一个灵巧的救赎。拯救失败时，目标会受到攻击的正常伤害并受到其额外的影响。救赎成功时，目标会受到攻击的一半伤害，但不会受到通常情况下命中后的额外影响。

modes.name: Lethal Strike
entries: As a bonus action, you imbue a weapon you're holding or your unarmed strike with psychic energy. The next time you hit with it before the end of your turn, it deals an extra {@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi} psychic damage per psi point spent.

modes.name: Augmented Weapon
entries: As a bonus action, touch one {@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}. Until your {@status concentration} ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +3 bonus to its attack and damage rolls.

psionic.name: Psychic Assault
entries: 你像武器一样挥舞着你的思想，释放出幻象的能量。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with psionic talents that deal psychic damage.

modes.name: Psionic Blast
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标在此能力上每消耗一个psi点会受到{@scaledamage 1d8|1-7|1d8|psi}的精神伤害。

modes.name: Ego Whip
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个智力救赎动作。拯救失败时，该生物会受到{@damage 3d8}的精神伤害，而且它充满了自我怀疑，使它在下一回合只能使用躲避、脱离或隐藏动作。如果救赎成功，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Id Insinuation
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个智力救赎动作。拯救失败时，该生物会受到{@damage 5d8}的精神伤害，并进入狂暴状态，因为它的意念横冲直撞。在它的下一个回合，它只能使用它的行动来进行躲避或攻击行动。拯救成功后，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Psychic Blast
entries: As an action, you unleash devastating psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make an Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 8d8} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 8d8|6-7|2d8|psi} if you spend 1 more psi point on this ability.

modes.name: Psychic Crush
entries: 作为一个行动，你在120英尺范围内创造一个20英尺的精神能量立方体。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个智力救赎动作。拯救失败时，目标会受到{@damage 8d8}的精神伤害，并且是{@condition stunned}，直到你下一回合结束。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。

psionic.name: Psychic Disruption
entries: 你创造的精神静电会扰乱其他生物的清晰思考能力。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks.

modes.name: Distracting Haze
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。该生物必须做一个智力救赎动作。如果救赎失败，它每花一个psi点就会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}的精神伤害，并且在你的{@status concentration}结束之前不能看到距离它10英尺以外的任何东西。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Daze
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。该生物必须做一个智力拯救动作。在拯救失败的情况下，目标会受到{@condition incapacitated}的影响，直到你的下一个回合结束，或者直到它受到任何伤害。

modes.name: Mind Storm
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的点。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个智慧拯救动作。拯救失败时，目标会受到{@damage 6d8}的精神伤害，并在所有拯救动作中处于劣势，直到你下一回合结束。拯救成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害。你在这个能力上每多花一个psi点，可以增加1%的伤害。

psionic.name: Psychic Hammer
entries: 作为一个动作，你试图用一只由心灵感应能量制作的手抓住你周围120英尺内你能看到的一个生物。目标必须在力量救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 1d6}力量伤害。如果它受到任何这种伤害，并且是大型或小型的，你可以在你选择的方向上直线移动它最多10英尺。你不能将目标抬离地面，除非它已经在空中或水下了。
当你达到5级（{@damage 2d6}）、11级（{@damage 3d6}）和17级（{@damage 4d6}）时，该天赋的伤害增加{@dice 1d6}。

psionic.name: Psychic Inquisition
entries: 你深入生物的头脑，发现信息或在其内部植入想法。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you know when a creature communicating with you via telepathy is lying.

modes.name: Hammer of Inquisition
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个智慧救赎动作。拯救失败时，它在你的下一回合结束前，每花费一个psi点，就会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}的精神伤害，并且在下一次智慧拯救中受到不利影响。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Forceful Query
entries: As an action, you ask a question of one creature that can see and hear you within 30 feet of you. The question must be phrased so that it can be answered with a yes or no, otherwise this ability fails. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or it replies with a truthful answer. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Ransack Mind
entries: 当你专注于这个能力时，你可以探测一个生物的思想。该生物必须保持在你的30英尺范围内，而且你必须能够看到它。如果你达到能力的全部持续时间，目标必须进行三次智力测验，你根据它失败的次数从它那里了解信息。如果一次蓄力失败，你就能学到它在过去12小时内的关键记忆。两次蓄力失败，你就能知道它在过去24小时内的主要记忆。三次蓄力失败，你就能知道它在过去48小时内的关键记忆。

modes.name: Phantom Idea
entries: 当你专注于这个能力时，你可以探测一个生物的思想。该生物必须保持在你的30英尺范围内，而且你必须能看到它。如果你达到了能力的全部持续时间，目标必须进行三次智力测验，而你会在它体内植入一段记忆或一个想法，这将根据它失败的测验次数而持续数小时之久。你可以选择这个想法或记忆是微不足道的（比如 "我早餐吃的是粥 "或 "啤酒是最糟糕的"）还是决定个性的（"我没能从兽人掠夺者手中拯救我的村庄，因此是个懦夫 "或 "魔法是一种祸害，所以我放弃它"）。如果一次救赎失败，这个想法或记忆将在接下来的4小时内持续。两次蓄力失败，它将持续24小时。三次蓄力失败，它将持续48小时。

psionic.name: Psychic Phantoms
entries: 你的力量深入到生物的头脑中，使其产生错误的认知。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks.

modes.name: Distracting Figment
entries: 作为一个行动，在你60英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。目标必须做一个智力救赎动作。拯救失败时，它每消耗一个psi点就会受到{@scaledamage 1d10|1-7|1d10|psi}的精神伤害，并认为它察觉到一个威胁性的生物就在它的视线之外；直到你的下一个回合结束，它不能使用反应，对它的近身攻击卷有优势。拯救成功时，它将受到一半的伤害。

modes.name: Phantom Foe
entries: As an action, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, it perceives a horrid creature adjacent to it until your {@status concentration} ends. During this time, the target can't take reactions, and it takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. You can increase the damage by {@scaledamage 1d8|3-7|1d8|psi} for each additional psi point spent on the ability.

modes.name: Phantom Betrayal
entries: As an action, you plant delusional paranoia in a creature's mind. Choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw, or until your {@status concentration} ends, it must target its allies with attacks and other damaging effects. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Phantom Riches
entries: As an action, you plant the phantom of a greatly desired object in a creature's mind. Choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, you gain partial control over the target's behavior until your {@status concentration} ends; the target moves as you wish on each of its turns, as it thinks it pursues the phantom object it desires. If it hasn't taken damage since its last turn, it can use its action only to admire the object you created in its perception. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

psionic.name: Telepathic Contact
entries: 通过引导幻觉的力量，你获得了控制其他生物的能力，用你的意志代替他们的意志。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you gain the ability to use your Telepathy class feature with up to six creatures at once. If you don't have that feature from the mystic class, you instead gain it while focused on this discipline.

modes.name: Exacting Query
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target truthfully answers one question you ask it via telepathy. On a successful save, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Occluded Mind
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target believes one statement of your choice for the next 5 minutes that you communicate to it via telepathy. The statement can be up to ten words long, and it must describe you or a creature or an object the target can see. On a successful save, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Broken Will
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can communicate with via telepathy. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, you choose the target's movement and action on its next turn. On a successful save, the target is unaffected, and you can't use this ability on it again until you finish a long rest. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

modes.name: Psychic Grip
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw, or it is {@condition paralyzed} until your {@status concentration} ends. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw. On a success, this effect ends. On a failure, you can use your reaction to force the target to move up to half its speed, even though it's {@condition paralyzed}.

modes.name: Psychic Domination
entries: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw, or you choose the creature's actions and movement on its turns until your {@status concentration} ends. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature is immune to this ability if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

psionic.name: Third Eye
entries: 你在心中创造出第三只通灵之眼，并将其投向世界。它将思想和知识传回给你，大大增强你的感官。
psionic.focus: While focused on this discipline, you have darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision with that range or greater, increase its range by 10 feet.

modes.name: Tremorsense
entries: As a bonus action, you gain tremorsense with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

modes.name: Unwavering Eye
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你在智慧检查上获得优势，持续1分钟。

modes.name: Piercing Sight
entries: As a bonus action, you gain the ability to see through objects that are up to 1 foot thick within 30 feet of you. This sight lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.

modes.name: Truesight
entries: As a bonus action, you gain truesight with a radius of 30 feet, which lasts until your {@status concentration} ends.
